content: *brighten santa s christmas with this warm toboggan-style stocking hat lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 40309 *clc-santahat pdf* skill level easy level 2 size child 11-12 adult medium circumference 18¼ 22¾ inches \ 46 5 58 cm mc lion® chenille article #530 *discontinued* 174 yards cc 320-100 fun fur yarn white 1 ball crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm worked in rounds from the top down finish with contrast trim edging add pom-pom on top in contrast color items in the santa claus set crochet 40309 santa claus hat 40310 santa claus scarf 1 40311 santa claus mittens 2 *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/santa-claus-scarf-crochet 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/santa-claus-mittens-crochet
